items.title: Stop Trying to Make Books Feel Like the Internet
items.description: It's time to stop trying to make reading feel like being online. Plus: book-inspired pet names, the Wicked: For Good trailer, and more.

items.title: The Bestselling Books of the Week, According to All the Lists
items.description: USA Today, Publishers Weekly, NYT, Amazon, and Indie Booksellers all have their own bestseller lists. Here are the combined results.

items.title: 17 New Queer Latine Books to Read for Latine Heritage Month — Or Any Time!
items.description: It's Latine Heritage Month, which means it's a great excuse to celebrate new queer books by Latine authors out in 2025.
